channel.title: Homepage on Canishk Naik
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Canishk Naik

item.description: I am a PhD student in the Economics Department at the London School of Economics and Political Science with interests in public and behavioural economics. My LSE webpage is here, and my email is c.naik@lse.ac.uk. I have a BA in Mathematics from the University of Cambridge and an MSc in Applicable Mathematics from the LSE. Before the PhD, I was an Economist at The Behaviouralist, a behavioural science research consultancy.
